original_text: Jerusalem was a large city, but not many people lived in it. We had not yet built many houses.
korean_text: 그 성읍은 광대하고 그 주민은 적으며 가옥은 미처 건축하지 못하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: but not many people lived in it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 안에는 많은 사람들이 살지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We had not yet built many houses
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 아직 많은 집들을 짓지 않았습니다
